alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 02 at 3:44PM HST until May 03 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING FOR THE ISLANDS OF KAUAI AND NIIHAU... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Niihau and Kauai. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Unstable conditions with slow moving heavy showers and thunderstorms will continue to develop through early Wednesday morning as a surface trough and upper low linger west of the islands. The heaviest rain will occur with pockets of heavy showers and slow-moving thunderstorms over the islands of Niihau and Kauai.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. Be prepared to take action if a Flash Flood Warning is issued. If you experience heavy rain or rising waters, head to higher ground immediately.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest
